website_summaries.verdict: VetPro is formulated by a veterinarian who has over 3 decades of experience working with dogs treating joint problems, arthritis, and hip dysplasia. With a stronger dosage, your dog takes fewer pills per day, so less stress for all concerned.
pros: 500 mg of glucosamine in every chew, along with 100 mg of chondroitin
Preventive supplements at this dosage level help reduce the cost of visits to the vet and help increase flexibility and joint regeneration
Chicken taste your dog will love, and made in the USA in a Good Manufacturing Certified process as an added bonus!
cons: Some complaints that dogs disliked the taste and avoided the product after the first few days
Bigger dogs may require 3 doses/day which means the costs will eventually add up even at this relatively lower price point

website_summaries.verdict: Formulated by veterinarians with decades of experience treating dogs. This stronger dosage per supplement option  requires fewer pills.
pros: Chondroitin and glucosamine in every chew (100 and 500 mg respectively) to prevent inflammation and joint problems before they develop
Owners say dogs eat these willingly like a treat due to the chicken flavor
cons: Bigger dogs may require 2 or 3 doses a day
Dogs with sensitive stomachs may have a bad reaction to these chews according to some users

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend  Product
customer_reviews.text: My dog was having trouble walking. Took him to the vet and we paid $$$$ hundreds for blood tests and ultrasounds to find out he was “lame” in three legs. He was given some pain pills and started walking again in a few days. A friend recommended this and I am now on my second bottle for my American Bulldog and he loves them. He seems to not be having any trouble and gets up just fine and is going up and down the stairs. I feel it is a good pain reliever and anti inflammatory chew.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Valente

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Our vet recommended glucosamine and chondroitin for my aging dog's joints. We tried the powder kind, but he ended up not liking it very much. We do not want to give a pill, so we have been trying these chews, which he loves! Not only do they have glucosamine, but also contains turmeric - which I have learned helps the joints by reducing the inflammation. These chews are now part of our daily routine!
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!!! High Quality + Delicious Treat for Your Pup 🐶💙
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the science of the product... BUT Degas (our pup) LOVES LOVES LOVES THE TASTE!!! He keeps begging for more and since he's 10.5 years old it's VITAL to us that HE HAS QUALITY PRODUCTS that help with arthritis, hip issues, etc. and help him live his best life now. I've also personally talked to the owners and can vouch for their passion AND commitment to quality products that help our pets. I wouldn't recommend any other brand for your pup!!! 🐶💙 - Kyle
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Has everything in it that is good for dogs, except it made my dog sick.
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing different joint support treats for dogs, this one was the most complete. However, my dog did NOT LIKE THE TASTE at ALL. Actually ran away when I tried to give it to him. I hid it in his normal everyday food and he became extremely ill. Vomited and diarrhea for 2 days after giving him just 2 treats. The smell of these is sort of "fish like". Hopefully for other dogs it works but it was not pleasant for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: mwis

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these since my normal subscribe and save ones were outed. The dogs like the flavor and eat them without hesitation. My oldest is a 12 year old corgi who has some nerve damage in his back legs. These chews seems to work better than the product I was using before. My only issue is they're kind of pricey. But if it help my dogs mobility and helps it prevent issues in his younger brother, I'm okay with it. I'll be making the switch to these for their regular supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Old dog into new pup
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old beagle mix gobbles them up. I add one on top of his food. He was having difficulty during and after our daily walks. I could tell his hips, legs, and paws hurt. He was slowing down into an old dog. I can see a dramatic change in his body and his personality. He feels better because these must have helped with his achy joints. He walks faster, and can go further and no longer excessively licks his sore paws. And does not look or act like an old dog anymore. People on our walks greet him with, "hi puppy." A dog mom knows, when her "pup" hurts and when he feels better.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wilke

customer_reviews.title: My picky little loveable diva likes them. Bella is happier and gets around better.
customer_reviews.text: My picky little loveable, spoiled diva likes them and she gets around better. Great product, my 12.5 year old dog is noticeably happier and more gets around great. Bella got her groove back! I have tried other products but I have to tease her with treats she loves to get her to eat them. She knows if she eats her Glucosamine then she will get her favorite treat. These are soft, moist treats with the perfect consistency. She only needs one which is important as well. Love this product, I wish I had discovered them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: J Marlatt

customer_reviews.title: These really work
customer_reviews.text: Was using a competitive product and had just about given up as I was not seeing any improvement. Read reviews of several others and saw they thought your product was brilliant so I decided to give it a try. Now, several orders later I can report that it has made an amazing improvement in our 12 yr old dog Fred. Thanks you for such a quality product!.
customer_reviews.author: David Cole

customer_reviews.title: My old girl loves these, and they are helping her.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second chewable that I bought for our old girl. The first one she loved for a few days, and then she spit them out. I resorted to pilling her with the first kind, but they did seem to help her. These she's been eating happily for a week. And yes, she is much more active, almost too active for her old legs. I have to tell her to slow down with a huge smile on my face.
customer_reviews.author: LBJ

customer_reviews.title: The stiffy jiffy joint reliever!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Mastiffs, 1 English Mastiff adult and 1 Dogue De Bordeaux puppy. Our English Mastiff had TPLO surgery done 2 years ago so she gets very stiff from arthritis and inflammation from time to time, especially in the colder months. This seems to really help her! We have always given her glucosamine supplements but this is by far the best one that I have found with the highest dose of Glucosamine and Chondrointin available. Plus they gobble them right up! It's a win win for everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Obermiller

customer_reviews.title: Melted mess
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived all melted and stuck together with a gunk and liquid mess in the container. Don't know how well it can work in this shape.
customer_reviews.author: Dorit Saberi

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: My three and a half year old boxer was having some visible discomfort with her hips and joints. She just didn't seem to feel that great during cold weather. Within a week, she already appeared to be in less pain, has more energy and is back to being her playful self. She also likes the flavor and accepts her daily supplement as a new favorite treat. The dosing seems a bit high for the first two week period and the cost is more than supplements from Costco or other competetors but seeing the results is certainly worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Procter

customer_reviews.title: What a difference a yummy chew makes.
customer_reviews.text: We found out after having her a few months that our senior rescue Yorkie mix had hip problems. I decided it was also time to start giving our 5 year old Schnauzer a joint supplement. Since giving them these, the 11 year old is running around the house as part of the pack. The Schnauzer hadn't had any problems with mobility but I don't expect her to while having the Vetpro complete Hip and Joint chews.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Broz

customer_reviews.title: Helps my aging Golden walk
customer_reviews.text: My Golden loves being outdoors and being active but as she has gotten older that has become more difficult. But with 3 of these little treats a day she moves more freely with less pain. These treats are more effective for her than the glucosamine pills in part because she loves to eat them. She is back to squeezing herself out the cat door when she wants extra yard time!
customer_reviews.author: Kiersty

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepard mix is 7 years old. He has been having problems with getting around. Before putting him on this product, he would lay around all day. He would get mad at our younger dog for messing with him. He wouldn’t go upstairs to sleep with us. We could tell he was in pain. We started him on this 30 days ago and he is a different dog. He runs and play with our younger dog. He wags his tail more and is up and walking around. He runs up and down the stairs. I will be buying this every month for my dog. I 100% believe that this product works!
customer_reviews.author: Breshears2010

customer_reviews.title: A good dog treat
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product. I did read the reviews. But, each dog really does have unique issues and needs as far as medication for what ails them. Our pup tore his acl a few years ago, surgery did not correct it well. Pain plus arthritis now, I thought this might help. He has had no visible relief from his pain at all. He does love to eat them, so we know they taste great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Causes dogs to throw up!
customer_reviews.text: My dog liked the taste but she throws up everytime we have given it to her. We tried morning, midday, or night but it didn't matter. She is small dog so I cut the pill in thirds and tried to give it in small doeses each day but no matter how I gave it to her she threw up several times within an hour. I wouldn't advise purchasing this item for your dogs unless you want to purchase carpet and wood cleaning materials at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Rice

customer_reviews.title: My pups love these!
customer_reviews.text: My pups love these soft chews and have had no issues digesting them. One pup is 10 1/2 and the other is 3. Both are German Shepherd Dogs. They think they are getting a yummy treat! I like the list of ingredients, and I hope the ingredients help support their hips and joints. I'll know more over time. (That's the reason for the 4 stars in the pain relief and value categories - I don't know for sure yet.)
customer_reviews.author: RA Wagner

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Of course I didn't try these myself, so I don't "really" know about the flavor, but my dog likes them. He thinks they are a special treat and they help with his joints and arthritis. We replaced a different brand with these and they appear to be equivalent, and he is pain free. He runs up the stairs to get his treats.
customer_reviews.author: moodina

customer_reviews.title: Has really worked for our 12 year old spaniel
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 older dogs and one, a 12 year old spaniel, was starting to get sluggish, reluctantly climbing stairs and slow to get on couches and the bed. After using this for just 2 weeks, he is back to himself, bounding across the yard, hopping on the couch and in a much better mood! Will start using on the other 2 as they need joint help.
customer_reviews.author: T Pray

customer_reviews.title: These vitamins are incredible! =D
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I have a 15 yo Springer Spaniel and a 13 yo Pit/Doxie mix and both were showing signs of age in their joints, energy levels, and responsiveness. I put them on Cosequin and it seemed to help a little, but then I found the VetPro vitamins, and it has drastically changed them! They are spry and alert and so much more active that they readily play and keep up with our Pit mix pup! They feel so much better! It's like VetPro vitamins took 5 years from their ages! TY, VetPro!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients, with a flavor they like...
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to get over the first hurdle..Had to be something she would consider a treat..She is very picky to smells before she tastes., but this soft chew has been no problem there.. I haven't had them long enough to attest to anything else...3 days doesn't do it , sorry.. This will help her joints if the previews prove to be right...
customer_reviews.author: spentout

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I have seen much of a change with my Aussie... he is not taking these 4 a day every day for about 7 weeks. In the first box we got they were much softer and he ate them happily, the second box they were harder and I need to convince him to eat them. Still hoping they will make the miracle the other comments here claim for...
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: I
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving my Great Pyrenees the hip and joint supplement for 1 month, and I have already seen outstanding results! He was struggling to get up and go outside to the bathroom, and now he is jumping up to great me at the door. I am so relieved to see such an improvement in his mobility! He is eager to eat his “treat” each day and seems to like the flavor. The only downfall I’ve see is my dog has had occasional loose stools.
customer_reviews.author: TDG

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with joint problems.
customer_reviews.text: My pup Riley has arthritis in her hips and knees, she has seen significant improvement since using Dr. Jo's on a daily basis. It's so nice to see her out running about again. My other dog, Bailey, also has mild arthritis and I've seen significant pep in her step as well. It also helps with overall energy and vitality levels. I can visually see how much better they both are on VetPro complete, it's amazing. They also love the way they taste! I've had issues getting them to take other glucosamine supplements, but not these. They see these as a great treat.
customer_reviews.author: ncstategrad

customer_reviews.title: My dog acts like a puppy again!
customer_reviews.text: Our lab is 10 years old. I bought these on a whim that he would eat them and he would be more mobile getting up and down from his pillow bed. Needless to say he jumps up from his pillow bed and moves around great outside to play as well as going up and down steps. So happy his joint pain is at a minimum and I believe its thanks to these Glucosamine soft chews that he is doing as well as he is.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J Olson

customer_reviews.title: She likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My boxer dog didn’t know what to do with these at first when I threw them on the ground, she sniffed them and then started to bite them and treat it like a mouse or something. It was actually really funny to watch. Ever since that first day, she just devours them as soon as I drop them down. I’m pretty sure shes taking better supplements than I am. I give her 2 every morning and I think it’s a good investment, boxers are known for hip issues later in life.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Helped my lab with his arthritis pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 year old black lab who started developing signs of pain in his back and legs upon standing up. The vet diagnosed him with arthritis. I started giving him VetPro complete a few weeks ago. Hes a large dog so I give him 3 to 4 a day. Ivr noticed a huge improvement in him. He's beginning to be playful again, can stand without a lot of pain. I will be giving him these for the duration.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Hiler

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes the taste
customer_reviews.text: I really can’t give it a star rating. Our lab has developed bad arthritis issues and wanted to give this a try before the $120 a month pills She likes the tabs, thinks they are a snack but had no visible effect But in all fairness she does have a bad case
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them, eliminated pain quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 year old 8lb doxie that has started showing some signs of irritation in his back. I ordered these in hopes of some relief for him. We doubled up doses at first, like they recommend, and within a week it’s like he was a whole different dog. Running again and now grunting and groaning. I am definitely having a vet check his back out as doxies are prone to back problems, but I will never go without these supplements again. I rarely write reviews but I encourage you to try these if you’re considering it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Bray

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It does have a strong smell, but not an unhealthy smell or something I would rate the product lower for. I would figure it's got a great flavor based off of his fast eating of it. My dog loves this product, and I like feeling like I'm being preventative. He didn't need it yet for pain relief, but I'm sure it would help with that too.
customer_reviews.author: Calley

customer_reviews.title: Stale Product
customer_reviews.text: My dog used to love these. It took me awhile to open the last batch, but it was sealed and well before the expiration date. But dried out and stale and basically a waste of money because my dog will no longer eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Seeing improvements in my older dog.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old dog seems to be doing better since taking this product. She isn't licking her leg anymore which I thought might be aching from arthritis. She sometimes stumbles and falls while on a walk, but this hasn't been happening hardly at all since she has been eating these. She begs to have her "treat" everyday so I know it must really taste good. I am happy we gave this product a try.
customer_reviews.author: You Are My Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkie didn't like it, but my daughters Boxer did.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter buys this all the time for her boxer. She feels that this product is great. I bought this product to try it on my Yorkie. She is very picky. Hardly eats anything. She refused to even try it. I gave it to my daughter for her boxer.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Myh dog loved tghe!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had hip dysphagia and had a hard time walking I gave her these the last month of her life and she really loved them! Unfortunately she got worse so we had her put down. But I would recommend these to anyone who's animal has arthritis or any type of joint problem!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I had been giving my dog regular human pills Glucosamine/Chondroitin because they need the same as we do and saw mild improvements. I started giving my pit these soft chews and in a few days I saw major improvements into her physical activities. I recommend this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Howdy

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help with our dog's arthritis. We use this in addition to her pain medication to help with her leg pain. Easy to feed to her, she likes the taste. Takes it like a treat. Seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: They like the chew
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only been on this for a week. I am using it for all 3 of my dogs. I have 2 mastiffs and a lab mix. They like the chew..I’m not sure if it is making a difference yet in pain...that will take a little longer to present itself. So far no adverse conditions like diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: My 10 y/o dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My old dog is acting like a puppy, she is running to keep up with our younger GSP. This stuff is wonderful. Until I started her on this product several weeks ago she crow hopped to run and lagged behind. This has made a world of difference.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara w.

customer_reviews.title: These chews really work!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were giving our dog pain medications to help her with pain control. We added these chews hoping to help her. Not only did they help her, the pain medications were discontinued and she is acting without limp or drawing her leg up. Amazing product. Exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Hardware4you

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable difference!
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 year old French Bulldog is a new dog! He is a large Frenchie - 38 pounds. Since starting him on this supplement, he is back to his younger days, running around, walking without limping, and getting up with ease! It has made a huge difference and so nice to see him doing so well! *Bonus - he loves these and is such a picky eater!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good company
customer_reviews.text: Repeat buyer..... Smell gross but dog seems to love them and has shown signs of improvement regarding her arthritis. Had direct contact with manufacturer concerning this product and they were fast to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Zonk 1/75

customer_reviews.title: Too tough on dog
customer_reviews.text: I can only give it two stars b/c my dog (12 yo male GSD) couldn’t stomach them - just made a mess on the other end. He ate them okay, but didn’t use them long enough to see results. Had to stop.
customer_reviews.author: GG-W

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Dog (5 y/o - Mini Poodle) seems to like the flavor of these a little better than the last brand we tried. Each chew has higher levels of vitamins, etc so that is a plus as well. Adds a bit of spunk to her during the day, feels like she shed a few years of age taking these. Will likely order again. Some other reviews complained of broken chews in their order, but all of ours were intact. May depend on the batch? No complaints from us.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Does seem to have helped our dog anything, that was natural was worth it to ease his mobility. When I compared to other products seemed the perfect one for us.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C.

customer_reviews.title: Dog thinks it's a treat
customer_reviews.text: have just received this item. My dog loves the flavor and I have no problem with giving it to him. He thinks it's a treat. I will follow up later with how well this item works for pain relief as I was told it takes a few weeks to notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: We are going on the 2nd month of this product, I do notice a difference in my dog, she has bad hips and she has been more active ( walking more). She loves the flavor and waits each morning at the cabinet for her daily "chew". My vet approved of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leta

customer_reviews.title: They smell terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I have two small dogs. One had a limp so that is why we purchased this product. when it arrived, only one of my dogs would take the "treat". We gave that dog, one a day for about 7 days then he stopped taking it. He would walk away from it. Now we have the rest of the bottle that they will not take. Not sure if it is the smell, or the taste. these were expensive to my pocketbook and they did not do what I had hoped they would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: been feeding these to my dog with knee problems for 3 months and i've sen no improvement what so ever
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. If there isn't one in his dinner Biden by 6:30 pm, he's letting me know. He's an 11 year old jrt. I bought these more as a preventative, as he wasn't really having any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Burkland

customer_reviews.title: after about 2 weeks dog walks farther
customer_reviews.text: been feeding to my 14 and a half year old black lab she seems to be going for more walks and longer distance than she has in over a year - reordered on my second batch
customer_reviews.author: steven j sharp

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed - My Dog won't eat them!
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate the first chew I gave him, but won't eat them anymore. I'm not a dog, but they don't smell good to me. They have a smoky smell. For the money I paid, I would like to return them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Steph H

customer_reviews.title: Great Product 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I use it for both my 13 year old retriever and there is a marked difference with his activity level. I also give it to my GSD puppy because it’s never too early to get them started. Two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: missy77

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My picky Chihuahua won't eat them (my poodle loves them) because he doesn't like fish anything but I trick him so they work. Definitely an improvement to his mobility and knees. Expensive but worth it if liquid is not an option. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lomax Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: Fern eats this vitamin which is rare being very picky. So it must taste good. Im not real sure how much these are working as I just received them
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: These are great for your dog if they have hip and joint problems I have a St. Bernard that is 11 and she has hip dysplasia and between this with cannabis it really helps her with daily movement
customer_reviews.author: Leah Dawn

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them! Plus they work :)
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these joint treats! He’s turned his head to other joint treats but loves these and gobbles them up. Thank goodness, he’s 15yo turning 16 in August and these have definitely put a little spring back into his step.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Hasn'r seemed to be very effective
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this to my dog for a month now and have seen very little change in this joint pain. I double the dose as suggested. For the amount I paid for this joint medication I will not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: My babygirl likes it, I like it for it's working
customer_reviews.text: Hera loves it. She thinks they're basically treats. it's been a week but I see some improvement on her left limp leg. I'm considering buying these ongoing for her joints just in case.
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This medication works!! I am so relieved for my old girl; she is frisky once again and much happier! I am signing up for automatic delivery!!
customer_reviews.author: dixieswampangel

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats these no problems. I feel as if he is more active now, but still has issues walking around. I will continue to use this product though.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: My picky dog loves them and they seem to help
customer_reviews.text: My dog has arthritis in her knees and I have tried several supplements but this one has worked the best so far. The price is cheaper than most of the other ones and she's very picky - she spit out 3 other brands I tried even when I hid them in ham slices or pill pockets. They seem to help with inflammation and mobility. Signed up for the subscription.
customer_reviews.author: M. Minn

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy in summer
customer_reviews.text: These are so sticky they showed up and where in a huge lump. Not easy to separate either. Quality seemed fine but not near as good as the brand I usually buy
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These help my dog a lot. I've found that long walks and ball playing are no longer leaving her stuff and sore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pro of an item
customer_reviews.text: I noticed my dog was very stuff in the morning. I bought these for her and not only are they a delicious treat (she LOVES) them but I noticed a huge difference in her no longer being stiff in the morning, she's more active, and back to her old puppy ways.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just about finished our first container, what a difference in our dog! She jumps like a kangaroo! She thinks these are treats, so I assume they are yummy! Ordering another container today! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BobALu

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. We rescued an 8 year old German Shepard from the pound and noticed to had some hip issues and decided to try Dr. Joseph's vetpro complete hip and joint soft chews. She has been running around and playing with our other rescue. She just seems happier and more comfortable. I cannot say enough good things about this product! We will be lifetime users for sure! And another plus, they absolutely love taking them!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan R.

customer_reviews.title: help for dog's hips/knees/joints.
customer_reviews.text: not sure on the flavoring but it didn't really help my dog. She did better with the individual ingredient pill.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy White

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Dog ate them for awhile and now will not, even when added to food. They're very dry, crumbly and smelly.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Happy Pups
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 large breed dogs and I want to help keep them flexible, thank you they love this product they look forward to it at cookie time!! I just wish it could be offered in a two dose daily my dogs are 60+ lbs. and I would love to by in bulk. Thanks very pleased customer 😃
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Britton

customer_reviews.title: Snubbed by Dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoyed them for about a week. Now he won't eat them. Even if we hide them in his dry food, he picks them out.
customer_reviews.author: Rtsquirrel

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 GSD, 1 is 4 years the other is 8 ( best guess he is a rescue). Both have increased mobility since they have been eating 4 treats a day.
customer_reviews.author: j lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great chews to aide sore joints
customer_reviews.text: We feed our 10 year old lab these and they make her days so much better! We can tell when she walks that her joints are sore. With these chews, she appears to more easily get about her day! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Tesch

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Milo (our senior Bichon Frise) can be kind of picky, but he LOVES these. We put them in his bowl in the morning with his food, and he ALWAYS digs the cute, little, bone-shaped, chewable out of his food first! He hasn't had any apparent flare-ups of arthritis or hip pain sense we switched him to this supplement either! Great ingredients! Great quality! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: One big chunk!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time irderung this product. It came in one melded chunk in the bottle. I had to chunk it out and separate it as well as possible....there are a million little pieces. The wirst part is that i have no idea the diseage I'm giving to my dog...not sure if I'll order again...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rakes

customer_reviews.title: Daily
customer_reviews.text: Best one I’ve found for hip and joint vitamins have helped my 12 year old tripawed dog. I can tell when he runs out he appears to struggle getting up and down. He has been doing great and usually gets vitamins when I arrive home. He is able to get up and down stairs while taking this and he takes us for walks.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Saw a difference in just one day!
customer_reviews.text: We saw a difference right away! We have a 130lb pyrenees mix and she was having such a hard time getting around. It broke our hearts, but since she has been taking these supplements she’s running around like a puppy!
customer_reviews.author: Grady Porter

customer_reviews.title: VetPro Complete Glucosamine for Dogs Soft Chews
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs and they all get this daily. My 4 year old Cockapoo has spinal isues and this product has made a tremendous difference in his mobiity. I recomend it to anyone who may have dogs with joint or spinal issues. And they love the taste!!
customer_reviews.author: Samandi Adams

customer_reviews.title: He's a new dog !
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16 year old pure-bred mutt with joint pain. I started him on the Hip&Joint and we saw a dramatic and noticable difference in about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Happy to say the product is effective. He has improved. To a noticeable level.
customer_reviews.text: My GSD Rocco likes them very much. It appears to be working at 3 weeks. Will have a better take on this product another 3 weeks. I was a little reluctant on the turmeric because he has a sensitive stomach.... No problem for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: MOM’s HAPPY PET
customer_reviews.text: My Mother’s Dog ABBY Could Hardly walk around... NOW SHE IS PLAYING & ENJOYING HER DAYS.!!!! 👍👍😎 WITH APPRECIATION, TOYMAN4LIFE / INSTAGRAM
customer_reviews.author: TOYMAN4LIFE

customer_reviews.title: Like a Puppy Again!
customer_reviews.text: My 50# 9 yr old pit bull loves these “treats!” My husband noticed a marked improvement almost immediately. He said while on walks our boy ran around like a puppy again. 2 chews daily makes this container last 2 months. He’s so worth it. We’re subscribing for their regular delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: i have not tried one myself, but my dog speaks 5 languages and says," it is tasty and effective, cute too!", his words, nor mine! =)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my girl
customer_reviews.text: The tablets smell terrible and my 8yr old mastweiler will not eat unless dipped in bacon grease...which i save. I have seen her go from struggling to get on the ottamon to jumping on it. I have tried other supplements but this one worked for her. Im on auto renew.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with mobility in older dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a 11 yr old border collie mix and she loves these vitamins. She still runs around with the puppy next door and can jump up on my bed which is very high. I believe these really help her mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it and we've seen marked improvement in his mobility!
customer_reviews.text: We love the product and so does our 7-going-on-8 lab! Since we started giving it to him, we've seen a marked improvement in his mobility and ability to bounce back from soreness caused by activity.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore joints
customer_reviews.text: Vet Pro Complete has helped my Belgian Malanois' joints tremendously since she is very hard on them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Seabolt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic  Product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. Within 2 days, my German Shepherd is back to getting up on the couch and bed for cuddling. I even give one to my poodle and she's much peppier. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LORIE S BRIDGES

customer_reviews.title: Really seems to help my dog
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product has really helped my dog with his movements and seems to help with his pain.
customer_reviews.author: d mary

customer_reviews.title: Hoping
customer_reviews.text: I have just finished the first 30 day treatment. Hoping to see improvement very soon.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Product seemed old and my dogs didn't care for them.  Saw no relief.
customer_reviews.text: Saw no difference and difficulties with getting my dogs to rat. Somewhat hard, like it was old. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have tried it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I finally decided to try a hip and joint supplement for my 13 year old aussie - she always seemed to be in pain and had no desire to do anything but lie down. I noticed a difference within just a week or so of starting her on these! It's like she has a whole new lease on life! Best $ spent ever!
customer_reviews.author: LaRinda Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Love my dog!
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog is much more active since starting this product. He rarely hesitated before climbing the stairs now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product that's easy for them to eat!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My dog was on another joint supplement, but it was a big horse-pill that she had a hard time eating. I love that you can crumble these on their food, and she seems to be doing better on these than on the other brand. I have started my older pup on these as well, and I've seen an improvement in her energy levels, so thank you for the free bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Higgy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work great for us
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, didn’t see much difference using this product, unfortunately. And my elderly Great Dane didn’t like the flavor... but she is pretty picky lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sandifer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping with dog's joint pain.
customer_reviews.text: Your product seems to be helping our dog with his symptoms from arthritis and miscellaneous joint pain as he ages. Of course, since he can't tell us exactly how he feels, we can only judge by his activity level and disposition.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey W. Locke

customer_reviews.title: It’s effective for our dog
customer_reviews.text: We just started using the product for 2 days only for our dog. So I actually don’t have the result of the product. But so far our dog can stand and less pain for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. My old dog likes them and they help his mobilty.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is generally fussy about "treats" but he loves these. I have already noticed the difference when he goes up and down the steps. They are definitely helping my old boy.
customer_reviews.author: shopper2

customer_reviews.title: Seriously happy doggy and mommy!
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a huge difference since I have been giving this to my dog. And I especially like that I say "you want your medicine" and my dog gets excited. He loves the taste and I'm sure he even notices the difference.
customer_reviews.author: kuuipo

customer_reviews.title: We love this product
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! Most importantly our Bulldog LOVES this product. He thinks they are treats - BUT! THEY HELPED HIS HIPS AND JOINTS he moves around much better and plays more now.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L

product_meta.title: VetPro Complete Glucosamine for Dogs Soft Chews Maximum Strength with Chondroitin, MSM, Turmeric, Vitamin C, Omega 3 - Treats Hip Dysplasia, Arthritis, Pain for Hip and Joints
feature_bullets: VETERINARIAN FORMULATED - Formulated by Dr. Joseph, a veterinarian with over 30 years of experience relieving his patients from painful arthritis, stiff joints, joint damage, and hip dysplasia. This Glucosamine for Dogs unique formula's benefits also provides the key nutrients needed for heart, skin, coat, digestive, and liver health.

5X MORE GLUCOSAMINE - 500 mg per chew - One of the most common injuries for dogs and cats involves their joints and the tissue surrounding it. To reduce costly vet visits, arthritis medications, or surgeries VetPro uses 1000mg of Glucosamine HCI and 200mg of Chondroitin in each dosage to keep joints flexible, lubricated, and to assist with the rebuilding of damaged tissue.

RELIEF FROM INFLAMMATION - If your dogs or cats love to play then they'll likely end up with painful swelling in their joints or paws. VetPro Complete daily supplements use natural turmeric root powder to reduce inflammation and be a super joint enhancer so they can rest comfortably after a rough day at the dog park.

CARDIOVASCULAR HEALTH - Having a healthy heart and cardiovascular system is critical for your four legged friends well being long term. Omega-3 fatty acids are used to promote a healthy heart which in turn improves your pets skin and coat while also warding off serious heart conditions.

TASTY INGREDIENTS - 120 chicken flavored dog glucosamine chondroitin chewables shaped just like a dog bone so you can replace non-nutritional treats. Made in the USA in a Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) certified process.
